Html:
Hello,
    I am starting to work with PHPExcel, and I have some questions about it,
  • Where are the documents that I write? I think taht in the samples the new document replace the php file that generate this.
  • My php version is 4.3.9 and I can´t install the 5.2 version, can I use phpexcel with a parse or something similar?
  • Where can I download the neccesary libraries to use phpExcel, PHP extension php_zip, PHP extension php_xml, PHP extension php_gd2?
Thank you very much, Daniel
it states in the FAQ that you need php 5.2 if you don't have 5.2 it is probably a no go.
